labels.name: publisher
labels.description: publisher or creator of the software

labels.name: version
labels.description: version number of date of the software

labels.name: used
labels.description: the context indicates that the mentioned dataset or software is used in the described research work

labels.name: created
labels.description: the context indicates that the mentioned dataset or software has been created in relation to the described research work

labels.name: shared
labels.description: the context indicates that the mentioned dataset or software is shared with evidence of sharing (e.g. url, repo, doi)
